awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 37 wins & 43 nominations.

fullplot: Warren Schmidt has led a safe, predictable life working in the insurance industry in Omaha, Nebr. for many years, yet now faces retirement. At the same time he is forced to take a hard look at his wife, his life and his relationship with his estranged daughter. An often hilarious series of events follow as Schmidt embarks on an unpredictable RV journey to attend his daughter's wedding in Denver.
plot: A man upon retirement embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.
title: About Schmidt

tomatoes.consensus: In this funny, touching character study, Nicholson gives one of the best performances of his career.
